description: Leader of the Ittou-ryuu and equal of Manji. This emotionally cold young man has prodigious skill with the sword, and leads the Ittou-ryuu in order to form a dojo dedicated not to form and rules, but to the simple test of superior lethality. Brought up by an abusive grandfather (a swordsman disgraced by the Asano dojo), Anotsu is as pragmatic and shrewd as he is deadly.
name: Anotsu Kagehisa
